summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the South Fork Tolt Hydroelectric Project; authorizing an installation, maintenance and operation agreement for certain distribution facilities; a distribution interconnection agreement; a long-term retail electric service agreement; and other necessary or convenient agreements; all for the provision of reliable long-term retail electric service to the water storage, diversion, conveyance, and water treatment facilities associated with the South Fork of the Tolt River; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
